DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare rate extent absorption Bupropion HCl extended-release tablet ( test ) Wellbutrin SR extended-release tablet ( reference ) single , one-tablet ( 150 mg ) dose fast subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Relative Bioavailability Study Bupropion Extended-Released 150 mg Tablets Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: Study Type : Interventional Study Design : Randomized , 2-period , 2-sequence , crossover design . Official Title : A Randomized , Single Dose Two -Way Crossover Relative Bioavailability Study Bupropion Extended-Released Tablets Formulation Fasted , Normal , Healthy Subjects . Further study detail provide Actavis Elizabeth LLC : Primary Outcome Measures : Rate Extend Absorption
